thread.title: adidas Highlights Unveils ’70s Berlin-Inspired Sportswear Collection
thread.title_full: adidas Highlights Unveils ’70s Berlin-Inspired Sportswear Collection

author: Daniel Pearson
title: adidas Highlights Unveils ’70s Berlin-Inspired Sportswear Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 17 images from this gallery. 
Brand: adidas Highlights
Season: SS17
Key Pieces: The pinstripe ’70s football shirt-inspired longsleeve in slide 1 and the navy and white quarter-zip track top in slide five are definite vibes.
Editor’s Notes: Showcased in the daunting setting of some colorful brutalist architecture in Neukölln, Berlin, this is another solid release from the Three Stripes. Whereas its previous collection drew inspiration from youth and nightclubs, this one is inflected with a football feel throughout. The collection will be rolled out at select European retailers in the coming months.
In other fashion news, Emily Ratajkowski stuns in DKNY’s SS17 Intimates campaign .
